an8.25:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmiṃ nigrodhārāme.
an8.25:4.2: Atha kho mahānāmo sakko yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an8.25:4.4: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho mahānāmo sakko bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
an8.25:4.6: “Yato kho, mahānāma, buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gato hoti, dhammaṃ saraṇaṃ gato hoti, saṅghaṃ saraṇaṃ gato hoti;
an8.25:5.2: “Yato kho, mahānāma, upāsako pāṇātipātā paṭivirato hoti, adinnādānā paṭivirato hoti, kāmesumicchācārā paṭivirato hoti, musāvādā paṭivirato hoti, surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānā paṭivirato hoti;
an8.25:5.3: ettāvatā kho, mahānāma, upāsako sīlavā hotī”ti.
an8.25:6.1: “Kittāvatā pana, bhante, upāsako attahitāya paṭipanno hoti, no parahitāyā”ti?
an8.25:6.2: “Yato kho, mahānāma, upāsako attanāva saddhāsampanno hoti, no paraṃ saddhāsampadāya samādapeti;
an8.25:6.3: attanāva sīlasampanno hoti, no paraṃ sīlasampadāya samādapeti;
an8.25:6.4: attanāva cāgasampanno hoti, no paraṃ cāgasampadāya samādapeti;
an8.25:6.5: attanāva bhikkhūnaṃ dassanakāmo hoti, no paraṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dassane samādapeti;
an8.25:6.6: attanāva saddhammaṃ sotukāmo hoti, no paraṃ saddhammassavane samādapeti;
an8.25:6.7: attanāva sutānaṃ dhammānaṃ dhāraṇajātiko hoti, no paraṃ dhammadhāraṇāya samādapeti;
an8.25:6.8: attanāva sutānaṃ dhammānaṃ atthūpaparikkhitā hoti, no paraṃ atthūpaparikkhāya samādapeti;
an8.25:6.9: attanāva atthamaññāya dhammamaññāya dhammānudhammappaṭipanno hoti, no paraṃ dhammānudhammappaṭipattiyā samādapeti.
an8.25:6.10: Ettāvatā kho, mahānāma, upāsako attahitāya paṭipanno hoti, no parahitāyā”ti.
an8.25:7.1: “Kittāvatā pana, bhante, upāsako attahitāya ca paṭipanno hoti parahitāya cā”ti?
an8.25:7.2: “Yato kho, mahānāma, upāsako attanā ca saddhāsampanno hoti, parañca saddhāsampadāya samādapeti;
an8.25:7.3: attanā ca sīlasampanno hoti, parañca sīlasampadāya samādapeti;
an8.25:7.4: attanā ca cāgasampanno hoti, parañca cāgasampadāya samādapeti;
an8.25:7.5: attanā ca bhikkhūnaṃ dassanakāmo hoti, parañca bhikkhūnaṃ dassane samādapeti;
an8.25:7.6: attanā ca saddhammaṃ sotukāmo hoti, parañca saddhammassavane samādapeti;
an8.25:7.7: attanā ca sutānaṃ dhammānaṃ dhāraṇajātiko hoti, parañca dhammadhāraṇāya samādapeti;
an8.25:7.8: attanā ca sutānaṃ dhammānaṃ atthūpaparikkhitā hoti, parañca atthūpaparikkhāya samādapeti, attanā ca atthamaññāya dhammamaññāya dhammānudhammappaṭipanno hoti, parañca dhammānudhammappaṭipattiyā samādapeti.
an8.25:7.9: Ettāvatā kho, mahānāma, upāsako attahitāya ca paṭipanno hoti parahitāya cā”ti.
